parameters.label: organization-defined subset of privileged users or roles

parts.name: statement
parts.prose: Authorize read-only access to audit information to {{ au-9.6_prm_1 }}.

parts.name: guidance
parts.prose: Restricting privileged user or role authorizations to read-only helps to limit the potential damage to organizations that could be initiated by such users or roles, such as deleting audit records to cover up malicious activity.
